alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Douglas; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:22AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rockdale, southern DeKalb, northern Fayette, southern Douglas, northwestern Henry, southwestern Fulton and Clayton Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 822 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Cascade Heights to near Fairplay, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Tyrone, Morrow, Hapeville, Palmetto, Lake City, Lithonia, Candler-Mcafee and Chattahoochee Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; DeKalb; Douglas; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale
